question: “Brown to Green Report” is an annual review of which regional group?
explanation: The Brown to Green Report is the world\'s most comprehensive annual review of G20 climate action. The report draws on the latest emissions data from 2017 and covers 80 indicators on decarbonisation, climate policies, finance and vulnerability to the impacts of climate change. According to 2019 report, G20 countries are responsible for 80% of global Green House Gas emissions.
